session.description: The ApartmentService session bean, which acts as a facade to the underlying entity beans and read-only DAO classes.

cmp-field.description: Returns the value of the id property.
Returns the value of the description property.
Returns the value of the apartmentid property.

query.ejb-ql: select distinct object (a) from deals a
select distinct object (a) from deals a where a.id = ?1
select distinct object (a) from deals a where a.description = ?1
select distinct object (a) from deals a where a.apartmentid = ?1

Returns the value of the city property.
Returns the value of the state property.
Returns the value of the zipcode property.
Returns the value of the apartmentid property.

query.ejb-ql: select distinct object (a) from address a

select distinct object (a) from address a where a.addresscol = ?1
select distinct object (a) from address a where a.city = ?1
select distinct object (a) from address a where a.state = ?1
select distinct object (a) from address a where a.zipcode = ?1
select distinct object (a) from address a where a.apartmentid = ?1
